scripts.install-ffmpeg: curl -L https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-i686-static.tar.xz -o ffmpeg.tar.xz && tar -xf ffmpeg.tar.xz && mv ffmpeg*/ffmpeg ./bin/ffmpeg && mv ffmpeg*/ffprop ./bin/ffprop && ./bin/ffmpeg -version
scripts.install-yt: curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o yt-dlp && chmod +x yt-dlp && mv yt-dlp ./bin/yt-dlp && ./bin/yt-dlp --version
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-ffmpeg && npm run install-yt
